## Design Specifications

### Colors
- Primary: #1E40AF (Railway Blue)
- Secondary: #059669 (Success Green)
- Accent: #F59E0B (Warning Orange)
- Background: #F9FAFB
- Text: #111827

### Typography
- Headers: Inter Bold, 24px
- Body: Inter Regular, 16px
- Buttons: Inter SemiBold, 16px

### Components
- Buttons: 48px height, 16px border radius
- Cards: 12px border radius, shadow-sm
- Inputs: 44px height, 8px border radius

### Animations
- Screen transitions: 300ms ease
- Button press: Scale 0.95
- Loading states: Pulse animation
